name: EfficienSee
title: 产能分析 - 优化生产
author: BinbinHfr
description: 优化大型工厂生产效率！检查每个产品和配方的产量，找出产能不足和产能过剩，列出每个配方的供需统计和工厂运转情况，让你轻松地发现整个生产链中的薄弱环节。
description_original: Optimise your mega-factory efficiency ! Check your production rates per items and recipes, hunting for under or over production, and display underemployed, blocked or starved machines on the map: useful to see where are the weak links in your production chain.
